Posts.Content: Don't panic! I also have extremely dense breast. I've been called back for ultrasound & mammograms almost yearly. It always scared me to death. I've had many needle biopsies & one surgical biopsy. I'm still breast cancer free. It doesn't always mean cancer. Just go back to make sure & ask for a written report from your doctor.
Posts.Title: Mammogram question

Posts.Content: I forgot to mention that I am 70 & after menopause almost all breast problems ended.
Posts.Title: Mammogram question

Posts.Content: Anyone have triple negative breast cancer that has had a recurrence?
Posts.Title: Triple negative

Posts.Content: My daughter had stage 2b triple positive breast cancer. She also had lymph cells test positive. She had chemo first then double mastectomy. At surgery no cancer was found. She opted not to have radiation. All this was done at MD Anderson in Houston. But, she would have had radiation before the breast implant surgery. She’s had the implant surgery and all is well with her. Hope this may help.
Posts.Title: Friend has breast cancer and being treated

Posts.Content: Anyone out there who's had or has triple positive breast cancer? My daughter was just diagnosed & we would like to hear from others with this breast cancer.
Posts.Title: Triple positive breast cancer!
